title: DiRT 3
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Get ready for DiRT 3 - race over 50 years of iconic rally cars in the snow, rain and dirt or express yourself in freestyle gymkhana events. Featuring the most rally content in the series, experience incredible damage and stunning weather as you race singleplayer, splitscreen and online in multiplayer.

childDownloads.title: Developer Q&A Part 2: Ken Block on Gymkhana
childDownloads.description: Codemasters latest video stars WRC driver and DiRT® 3™ technical consultant Ken Block, focusing on the all-new gymkhana game mode. The trailer mixes live action with gameplay footage as Ken Block explains the origins of the discipline and how players can hone their rally skills by unleashing their inner hoonigan. The video introduces gymkhana, the freestyle car driving showpiece pioneered by Ken Block whose video series has become a 90 million-plus views YouTube phenomenon. The trailer shows Ken Block performing incredible stunts and stunning feats of car control in a heavily modified rally car and shows how you can perform the same stunts in DiRT 3's unique gymkhana discipline.

childDownloads.title: DiRT 3
childDownloads.description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Get ready for DiRT 3 - race over 50 years of iconic rally cars in the snow, rain and dirt or express yourself in freestyle gymkhana events. Featuring the most rally content in the series, experience incredible damage and stunning weather as you race singleplayer, splitscreen and online in multiplayer.

childDownloads.title: BMW M3 Rally
childDownloads.description: Download the BMW M3 Rally car from the Power and Glory Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to race in 80s Rally events in singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer.

childDownloads.title: Chevrolet Camaro SSX Concept
childDownloads.description: Download the Chevrolet Camaro SSX Concept car from the Power and Glory Car Pack, complete with 4 liveries to race in Trailblazer singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Citroën C4 Rallycross
childDownloads.description: Download the Citroën C4 Rallycross car from the Mud and Guts Car Pack, complete with 2 liveries to race in Rallycross singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Colin McRae Vision Charity Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Colin McRae Vision Charity Pack and receive the Ford Escort Mk II, a 70s Rally car with five liveries. All Codemasters' profits from this pack will go to the Colin McRae Vision Charity (SC039506).

childDownloads.title: Ford Focus ST Rallycross
childDownloads.description: Download the Ford Focus ST Rallycross from the Power and Glory Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to race in Rallycross singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Ford Mustang GT
childDownloads.description: Download the Ford Mustang GT from the Mud and Guts Car Pack, complete with 4 liveries to race in Trailblazer singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Horn Pack
childDownloads.description: Download 6 new Horns and let your rivals know you're coming for them!

childDownloads.title: Ken Block Special Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Ken Block Special Pack and receive a customised and upgraded Ford Escort Mk II, an Open Class Rally car sporting a killer Ken Block livery.

childDownloads.title: Lancia Delta S4
childDownloads.description: Download the Lancia Delta S4 from the Power and Glory Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to race in Group B Rally and Rallycross singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Lancia Stratos
childDownloads.description: Download the Lancia Stratos from the Mud and Guts Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to race in 70s Rally singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Mini Gymkhana Special Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Mini Gymkhana Special Pack and receive the mid-engined Mini Cooper S Gymkhana, customised and tuned to become an outrageously responsive gymkhana car.

childDownloads.title: Monte Carlo Track Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Monte Carlo Track Pack and take on 8 breathtaking Rally stages featuring the dramatic climbs, descents and hairpins of snowy mountain roads. Race through the Alps and conquer the legendary Col de Turini pass in singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer.

childDownloads.title: Mud and Guts Car Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Mud and Guts Car Pack to gain access to 5 new cars available for singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events. Race the Lancia Stratos, Peugeot 205 T16 Evo 2, Citroën C4 Rallycross, Saturn Sky and Ford Mustang GT, each with a range of liveries.

childDownloads.title: Peugeot 205 T16 EVO 2
childDownloads.description: Download the Peugeot 205 T16 EVO 2 from the Mud and Guts Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to race in Group B Rally and Rallycross singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Power and Glory Car Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Power and Glory Car Pack to gain access to 5 new cars available for singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events. Race the BMW M3 Rally, Lancia Delta S4, Ford Focus ST Rallycross, Scion tC and Chevrolet Camaro SSX Concept, each with a range of liveries.

childDownloads.title: Saturn Sky
childDownloads.description: Download the Saturn Sky from the Mud and Guts Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to hoon about in Gymkhana singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Scion tC
childDownloads.description: Download the Scion tC car from the Power and Glory Car Pack, complete with 5 liveries to hoon about in Gymkhana singleplayer, splitscreen and online multiplayer events.

childDownloads.title: Teams and Cars Unlock Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Teams and Cars Unlock Pack and gain access to all 30 teams and every car in the game. NOTE: The Teams and Cars Unlock Pack does not include content from other DiRT 3 downloadable content. All content made available via the purchase of this downloadable content can be unlocked through normal gameplay.

childDownloads.title: VIP Pass
childDownloads.description: Unlock all DiRT 3 multiplayer modes, 5 cars and the opportunity to upload highlights of your best runs direct to YouTube* with the DiRT 3 VIP Pass†.  With the VIP Pass you can prove yourself online across all game modes in competitive Pro Tour events and unranked Jam Sessions. Also included in the VIP Pass is the chance to upload highlights of your most spectacular crashes, gymkhana runs and races direct to YouTube. Finally, five amazing cars are also included;  the Colin McRae R4, 1995 Subaru Impreza WRX STI, Ford Sierra Cosworth RS500, Peugeot  405 T16 Pikes Peak and Hummer H3.   *Xbox 360 Hard Drive required. †Purchase not required if you already have a VIP Pass code.

childDownloads.title: X Games Asia Track Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the X Games Asia Track Pack to go for the win in Japan. The X Games Asia Track Pack includes four routes set across two new tracks in Shibuya, the neon heart of central Tokyo. These spectacular mud-spattered Rallycross circuits weave beneath towering skyscrapers in front of thousands of cheering fans.

childDownloads.title: DiRT 3 Group B Trailer
childDownloads.description: Group B is synonymous with a short-lived period in Rally where light regulation and few restrictions on car development led to manufacturers producing some of the most exciting cars that the sport has ever seen. Group B cars have since entered Rally folklore since cars with their astonishing power couldn't have been developed during any other era of the sport. Sadly, these iconic cars were involved in an increasing number of accidents, which resulted in the banning of Group B Rally in 1986. The gameplay video showcases these super-charged icons of Rally being put through their paces in wide ranging conditions, from tarmac to dirt and snow. In DiRT 3, the Group B discipline gives players the ultimate test as they jump behind the wheel of some of the most famous cars to compete in the sport.

childDownloads.title: DiRT3: DC Compound
childDownloads.description: See DiRT 3's incredible all-new Gymkhana game mode in action in the stunning DC Compound Gymkhana Trailer video, captured entirely from in-game footage. In the video Ken Block's Gymkhana THREE Ford Fiesta powerslides under  lorries, crashes through boxes and leaps across huge jumps in a breathtaking, tyre-shredding masterclass of car control.  Inspired by the 90 million plus views video series inspired by Ken Block, DiRT 3 Technical Consultant, the gymkhana mode lets you unleash your inner hoonigan as you perform stunts and jumps in purpose built arenas. Express yourself in freestyle sessions or complete courses by performing spectacular stunts, racking up combos and chaining style points.

childDownloads.title: DiRT3 Developer Q&A Part 1: Rally
childDownloads.description: Viewers are taken behind the scenes of DiRT 3, as key development talent introduce the game, answer questions from fans and hone their real-world driving skills by racing Escort Mk IIs around the forests of Wales at the Phil Price Rally School. The developer diary also reveals the first DiRT 3 gameplay footage, showing the iconic Audi Sport Quattro Rallye tearing through a forest stage at the new Finland rally location.   The Developer Q&A: Part 1 - Rally is the first in a planned series, each of which will focus on a different area of the game.

childDownloads.title: DiRT3: Developer Q&A Part 3
childDownloads.description: The third DiRT 3™ developer Q&A, focuses on the myriad advancements set to make the car handling the most authentic in the series. The 'Keep It Real' video features developers answering questions, fans playing the game and Rally drivers Kris Meeke and Ken Block putting DiRT 3 through its paces. The video includes new gameplay footage, showcasing the blistering speed, jaw-dropping damage effects and stunning graphics for which the series is famed.

childDownloads.title: DiRT3: Gameplay Trailer
childDownloads.description: This DiRT 3 attract video highlights the breadth of content in the latest release in the acclaimed series. Showcasing Rally, Rallycross, Gymkhana, weather conditions (including snow), night racing and a number of stunning locations.

childDownloads.title: DiRT3 Teaser Trailer
childDownloads.description: In 2011 DiRT3 will redefine action sports racing as the biggest, most content-rich racer to ever roar into your living room. Packing more than double the track content from the million-plus seller DiRT 2, get dirty in the finest off-road vehicles and best rally cars from 5 decades of the sport.   Become a professional action sports driver building a career in fiercely competitive off-road racing, from Europe to the USA and Africa. Take on multi-stage rallies, go for gold at X-Games and express yourself in incredible Gymkhana driving events, the ultimate in freestyle car control. With astonishing weather effects – including snow and ice racing – and jaw-dropping visuals and damage, DiRT3 will leave the competition in its tracks.
